header.title: Dam Sarvi Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming Events Meeting
header.purpose: To discuss plans for the Dam Sarvi Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming events, focusing on logistics, vendor management, security, and cross-promotional strategies.
header.attendees: Alia, Sebastian, Jet, Asfar, Kang, Rohimi

tasks.Description: Finalize power strip specifications for the Dam Sarvi car showcase with Jet.
Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability for the sound system ASAP.
Inform the trolley cart driver to stick with the Center Court for the car showcase.
Push Jumbo Rentals for at least a 10% cut on the sound budget.
Start drafting the Shaver Gaming media invites.
Lock in Ken Lim's Twitch slot for Shaver Gaming.
Handle the Dam Sarvi media invites.
Confirm the costume rack specs with Tech Zone and email the sketch to release production for Shaver Gaming.
Submit the police traffic permit applications for both events.
Follow up with the fire department regarding the COVID-19 SOP and fire safety clearance for both events.
Ping the vendor directly and get a concrete delivery date for the VR demo gear.
Map out specific routes and timings with security for loading and unloading cars and gaming equipment.
Coordinate closely with mall operators to ensure minimal disruption to mall goers during setup and teardown for both events.
Talk to Esports Channel about featuring a segment on the CYD Nova EV and Autobus about a casual gaming peripheral review.
Reach out to HyperX and Logitech to explore cross-promotional opportunities.
Chase Asfar on the New G Store renovation fire safety audit submission and ensure clearance is sorted.
